info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 3:44AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Warren and McDonough Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 343 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Bardolph, or near Macomb, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...AWOS. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Macomb, Bushnell, Colchester, Industry, Prairie City, Bardolph, Western Illinois University, Adair, Fandon, New Philadelphia, Pennington Point, Macomb Municipal Airport, Doddsville, Scottsburg, Prairie City Airport and McDonough County 4-H Grounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
